prompt:
Create a webtoon/manga panel in webtoon art style.

## ATMOSPHERE & MOOD
LIGHTING: Early morning - soft diffused light, pale yellows and pinks, gentle shadows, dew-fresh feel

## VISUAL CONTINUITY (CRITICAL)
Match the reference image for:
- Art style, line weight, coloring technique
- Character appearance (face, hair, clothes)
- Color palette and lighting direction
- Background style and detail level

Create NEW composition showing:
- Fresh pose and body position for this action
- New camera angle as specified
MAINTAIN: Focus on the hand releasing the object.

## COMPOSITION
- Shot: close-up shot focusing on face and expressions
- Angle: high angle looking down, shows vulnerability or overview
- Location: The Alchemy Lab (A circular stone room filled with fumes and bubbling sounds. It feels claustrophobic and volatile.) - Visual elements: Lighting: Dim, illuminated by green and orange liquid glows, Key Object: The central copper distiller that hisses rhythmically, Atmosphere: Suffocating, humid, tense, Palette: Rust orange, copper, toxic green
## CHARACTERS (CRITICAL: Match reference images EXACTLY)
For each character, you MUST:
- Use the EXACT same costume/outfit as shown in their reference image
- Match hair color, style, and accessories exactly
- Keep facial features consistent with reference
- Only change: expression, pose, and camera angle as specified

**Elara Vance** (MUST match reference image exactly)
  Appearance: Petite build, constantly looks sleep-deprived, hunched posture to appear smaller.
  Visual details: Hair: Messy auburn bun with loose strands falling in face, Eyes: Amber eyes that glow faintly gold when predicting (hidden by glasses), Top: Oversized beige cable-knit sweater vest over untucked white shirt, Bottom: Faded navy pleated skirt, hem undone on one side, Footwear: Scuffed brown loafers with mismatched socks (one cream, one white), Accessories: Cracked round spectacles taped at the bridge (Signature Item)
  Expression: neutral
  Position: left of frame

## ACTION & EMOTION
Elara deliberately opens her fingers. The mug falls from her hand to the floor.

## VISUAL EFFECTS (if appropriate)
- Motion lines for movement
- Speed lines for action
- Sparkles/glow for magical/emotional moments
- Dramatic lighting for tension

## TECHNICAL REQUIREMENTS
- FULL BLEED composition (art to all edges, NO white borders)
- NO text, speech bubbles, or sound effects in image
- Clean professional linework
- Expressive faces with clear emotions
- Dynamic poses with weight and balance
- Rich background detail that supports the mood

panel_data.action: Elara deliberately opens her fingers. The mug falls from her hand to the floor.
panel_data.continuity_note: Focus on the hand releasing the object.
